issue.title: Pulseblaster flags being stored as unicode string instead of int?

content.raw: Not sure why we store them as strings, but we do. The problem is that they were previously bytestrings but are now unicode strings, and spinapi only became more accepting of string types for the bitfields in 3.2.0. Testing must have been done with an updated spinapi, and we forgot to add a version check. I'll add a version check to PulseBlaster.py.
